Posts.Content: Hello again. just wanted to give an update. The incision is healing nicely. the stress level these past four days was thru the roof .i wish they did not make you wait for the results..I was relieved to get good news today it was only a cyst..I felt a huge weight lifted off of my shoulders . the whole experience makes you look at your life differently....my prayers are with all of you who are going thru it also
Posts.Title: Needle Localization/biopsy 1 2 3

Posts.Content: hi, i read the posts here when i found out i had to go have a excisional biopsy with needle localization. I am also an RN which did not help the anxiety level i was feeling. I had it done at the hospital ( outpatient). i was a wreck could not sleep for the past week and a half. just wanted to say the needle localization was not at all what i expected.i had a radiologist tech that stayed with me thru the radiology testing. it went smooth just one little stick.i had anticipated the worst. have such a fear of needles ....after the needle localization i went for a mammogram to make sure the wire was in the right spot.the surgery and post op went smoothly. the day of surgery i was up and out shopping afterwards .felt fine and by the next day i was back to normal.would not know i had anything done at all. small suture area. the hardest part is the waiting till Tuesday for the results.just got to hope for the best.i hope i may be able to alleviate someones level of anxiety by telling of my experience...
